about_the_game:
Dreaming with You unfolds as an immersive third-person adventure that takes place inside the shared dream of Michael and Sarah, two adults who are struggling with carrying the weight of their past.

Michael, a 28-year-old software developer whith only one dream, and that's to be capable of providing for his family by selling the game that he's working on. However, a tragic car accident stole his wife and kid away from him. Two years have past since the incident, and even though he laughs and smiles from time to time he's not the man he used to be. He started to drink with his friends more and more, night after night, he rejects any woman that might like him, and he starts to look more like a walking empty shell. His unfinished game however still served him as a guiding light because he still works on it everyday in order to fulfill his promise.

Sarah, a brilliant and dedicated 27-year-old doctor, loved helping people in need, and that's partly why she had little time for personal connections. The other reason is that due to many past betrayals, she nearly lost all faith in men. That's why, in her free time, she indulges in gaming, a passion that has been with her since childhood. Yet, the joy she once found in this activity starts to fade away as she doesn't realize that overworking herself, even though it saves lives, consumes hers in return.

Their paths were meant to cross on a date organized by well-meaning friends, but both declined as they always had in the past years. However, destiny had other plans for them this time. The night before the date, they fell asleep and woke up in a shared dream world that mirrored the unfinished game Michael was working on.

As they find themselves kidnapped, they need to work together in order to escape. With this said, they embark on a quest filled with puzzles that mirror their shared love for gaming, sprinkling the adventure with references to beloved games, movies, anime, and memes.

As Michael and Sarah navigate this breathtaking dreamworld, they discover that their newly formed connection reaches a new level, one that goes beyond their past grief and heartbreaks.

Key Features:
  • 🌙Shared Dreamworld: Immerse yourself in the beautiful environment of the Dreamworld.
  • 🤝Collaborative Play: Get to play as both Michael and Sarah in order to solve puzzles togheter.
  • 🎭Character Depths: Delve deeper into Michael and Sarah's backgrounds. Find more about their pasts, their fears, and why they act the way they do.
  • 🧩Funny, Frustrating or Difficult Puzzles: Prepare to solve all kinds of puzzles that are the result of a game dev and a gamer imagination colliding with one another.
  • 🥰Heartwarming Story: Guide Michael and Sarah to their escape and along the way help them to get over the problems that they've been struggling with.
  • 💌Romantic Sparks: Witness the birth of an unexpected romance between the two, in a rom-com fashion, as they progress throughout the story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core I5 7600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core I5 10400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Dreaming with You is an immersive third-person adventure set within the shared dream of Michael and Sarah. In this enigmatic dream, they find themselves kidnapped, forced to collaborate for their escape. The twist: as they work together, they might fall in love with eachother in a rom-com fashion.
